name: Lost in Geson
description:
Humans and Robots used to live together in planet Geson, but an unexpected scientific discovery forced the humans to escape to another planet in order to avoid their extinction. Lots of robots were left behind, including our main character, Max.


Help Max fulfill his dreams by using your intellect and abilities. With surprising game mechanics, you will have to face puzzles and enemies. Join the adventure and discover what you are worth.
